pages.text: A truly exceptional weapon, it embodies the definition of "offense is the best defense."$(br)It is the nature of the Dreamflayer to balance forces:$(br)The more armored your opponent is compared to you, the more damage you do.

$(italic)If you ever needed a reason to go rampage lightly clad, here it is$()$(br2)$(k:sneak) + $(k:use) to empower it, allowing it to slice even though the most sturdy of armors, while consuming $(c_red)Red Ink$() at an alarming rate
